```{r}
#| include: false
library(here)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)

df <- read_csv(here("data/processed/submissions_cleaned.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE)
df$`Code link` <- paste0("<a href='", df$`Code link`, "'>", df$`Code link`, "</a>")
df$Website <- paste0("<a href='", df$df$Website, "'>", df$df$Website, "</a>")
# Do we need to handle missing emails? Probably...
df$Email <- ifelse(!is.null(df$Email) && !is.na(df$Email), paste0("<a href='mailto:", df$Email, "'>", df$Email, "</a>"), "") 
```

```{r}
datatable(
  df,
  filter = "top",
  rownames = FALSE,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 25,
    scrollX = TRUE
  ), 
  escape = FALSE
)
```
